title: U.S. health care is broken. Here are 3 ways it's getting worse
description: One year after UnitedHealthcare's CEO was shot and killed, the crisis in U.S. health care is intensifying — even for the companies and investors who make money from it.
content:
One year after UnitedHealthcare's CEO was shot and killed, the crisis in U.S. health care has gotten even worse in ways both obvious and hidden.
People increasingly can't afford health insurance. Th… [+8116 chars]
